availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a lawyer in Simpson County. Active in Democratic politics, Bush served as a secretary of the Kentucky Third District Democratic Convention in Bowling Green in 1859.

Spouse: Virginia H. Bush
Children: Mary G. Bush, Nellie Bush

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, Page 17.
The Louisville Daily Courier, "Third Congressional District-Nomination of W. W. Sale for Congress," May 25, 1859, page 1.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, "William Walter Bush," https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=14991095&ref=acom accessed 05/17/2017.
